ANU.name: Eroia Barone Nugent
interest: Highschool girls experiences with STEMScience communication through school curriculumInfluence of Science Outreach Programs
ANU.biography: STEM curricula structure is the backbone of science communication in our culture. I am interested in how the education system can promote or hinder the advancement of students taking up STEM subjects beyond the compulsory Year 10 level and which factors influence gender disparities in physics-based STEM.
